localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.author: M Dorsett

nodes.excerpt: LivingWriter is the best writing app available right now. It takes all the features of Scrivener and other such apps and makes it all modern, clean and beautiful. Start your book, plot your book, write your book, and organize your book all in one place.
nodes.title: LivingWriter - The Best Writing App - All the features for novel writing in one clean package.
nodes.author: Casey Kerbs

nodes.excerpt: Plan a full week of meals with a single click. Just tell us which foods you like, and how many calories, protein, fat, and carbs you want to eat. Swap out a meal, a day, or a week! We can fit in your treats, and even give you a grocery list!
nodes.title: Prospre - Generate custom meal plans with one click
nodes.author: Colin Hunt

nodes.excerpt: Wrekt is a social deduction game meant to be played with groups. Use it to split the bill at the end of a meal or just play for fun!
nodes.title: Wrekt - A social deduction bill splitting game
nodes.author: andy wang

nodes.excerpt: My Wolfpack is a friendly app that microgroups people according to their interests. If you are not particularly looking for dating but don‚Äôt want to meet people in huge groups that forbids you to really get to know them, you are in the right place.
nodes.title: My Wolfpack - Meet new friends according to your interests in micro-groups
nodes.author: Murat Aksu

nodes.excerpt: Your Week is a simple weekly planner that I built to help me plan my priorities at the start of the week. It has a clear week-based layout and provides a helpful reminder to plan each week. Try it at https://yourweek.app or get the Android app.
nodes.title: Your Week - Hold yourself accountable to weekly goals and priorities.
nodes.author: Graham Macphee

nodes.excerpt: Resold is a marketplace for people to buy & sell with same-day delivery. 1. List a piece of furniture on Resold 2. Request an Uber driver to have your furniture delivered in minutes. 3. Payment is delivered direct to your bank account.
nodes.title: Resold - Buy & sell with same-day delivery
nodes.author: Joe Kuczek

nodes.excerpt: App Mockup is the design tool to create the most compelling screenshots for the App Store and Google Play. No account required.
nodes.title: App Screenshot Mockup - Make perfect screenshots for mobile apps
nodes.author: John

nodes.excerpt: GlamAR is a virtual makeup try-on, designed for beauty and cosmetic brands. Integrate with your brand website or app to help customers try-on products live, directly from their mobile or laptop.
nodes.title: GlamAR - Augmented Reality platform for a seamless try on experience
nodes.author: Farooq Adam

nodes.excerpt: The Med&Beyond telehealth app offers you a video visit with an online doctor 24/7 without leaving your home or office. Install our app and access a board-certified doctor on demand anytime, without the need for health insurance.
nodes.title: Med & Beyond - Ask a real doctor 24/7
nodes.author: Samuel alex

nodes.excerpt: Baaz enables live video commerce for retailers globally. A retail store can host live videos, manage catalogs, live chats, payments, shipping, promotions and influencers from Baaz app. All things related to live video shopping in one place.
nodes.title: Baaz - Create virtual showroom in less than 1 min & sell online
nodes.author: Chitresh Parihar

nodes.excerpt: Personal journal app for everyone where you can get connected with others! Goodnight Journal is the only personal journal app that offers modern design that works the same on any device, with the community, chat and features to boost your mental health.
nodes.title: Goodnight Journal 2.0 - Facebook for journaling
nodes.author: Arman

nodes.excerpt: Learn Azure Fundamentals is an app which helps you to learn the basics of Microsoft Azure and Cloud Computing by answering questions in tests. App contains 14 unique tests, 269 questions, 132 articles. Learn offline. App is absolutely free. No Ads.
nodes.title: Learn Azure Fundmentals - Learn Microsfot Azure fundamentals by passing tests
nodes.author: Denis Kazakov

nodes.excerpt: It‚Äôs a fun & easy solution for you and your friends to find the best movie or TV-show to watch on Netflix. Swipe through media name cards. If all your friends like the same movie, it's a match! Less scrolling more watching
nodes.title: Couchers - Less scrolling more watching.
nodes.author: Ali Raza Noorani

nodes.excerpt: imbue allows influencers to create & monetize beautiful fitness experiences while allowing you unprecedented access into the fitness routines of the influencers you know & love.
nodes.title: imbue - Beautiful fitness experiences with influencers.
nodes.author: Alex Carrabre

nodes.excerpt: Blending Psychology and Artificial Intelligence with layers of insights from 10,000+ books and articles, Odo is your empathetic AI companion that chats, reads, thinks, and offers a helpful conversation to help you grow. Only available in India.
nodes.title: Odo - An empathetic AI companion to help you grow
nodes.author: Bhuwan

nodes.title: Physique AI (Android & iOS) - AI-powered 1:1 posture correction to improve home workouts
nodes.author: Vignesh Prabhu

nodes.excerpt: 1 Second Everyday is a video diary that makes it easy to take your day-to-day moments and create a meaningful movie of your life. It‚Äôs a home for all your notable memories, not just the Insta-worthy. Get started with 1SE today!
nodes.title: 1 Second Everyday 4.0 - A movie that includes every day of the rest of your life
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: "Every day, it gets a little easier. But you gotta do it every day, that's the hard part". Everyday helps you break goals down into tasks we can execute on every day, colouring our beautiful board whilst forming new habits, ultimately reaching our goals.
nodes.title: Everyday 2.0 - Simple & beautiful habit tracker for the Web, iOS & Android
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: PictureThis¬Æ identifies 1,000,000+ plants every day with 98% accuracy-better than most human experts. Get your gardening questions answered and become a ‚Äúgreen thumb‚Äù! Simply take a photo of the plant and PictureThis answers all the questions for you!
nodes.title: PictureThis 2.0 - Instantly identify plants like a botanist in your pocket üå±

nodes.excerpt: Look Back On Your Year Our guided annual review helps bring perspective and closure to the past year before you dive into the year ahead.
nodes.title: Guided Annual Review by Reflection.app - A guided review to help you make sense of and grow from 2020
nodes.author: dave radparvar

nodes.excerpt: It's easy: go on the map, tap on another user, and send them a request for a photo! Gallery uploads are not allowed, so any photo they send will be taken on the spot, which means extra fresh photos on delivery!
nodes.title: Looxie - Location-based photo requests
nodes.author: Antonis Tsagaris

nodes.excerpt: SnapSmile is an app that uses your eating habits + images of your teeth to provide you with the insights, and recommendations you need to improve your oral health at home. Think of SnapSmile like your own Dental Coach.
nodes.title: SnapSmile - We use machine learning to help improve your dental health
nodes.author: Kartik Bala

nodes.excerpt: We designed Yak Tack to help you boost your vocabulary in a matter of days. We use a simple, scientifically proven technique called spaced repetition to get people past the "Ebbinghaus Forgetting Curve" when learning new words.
nodes.title: Yak Tack: Mobile App - Broaden your vocabulary. Simply.
nodes.author: Jeremy Thomas

nodes.excerpt: Is Woofbuzz just another dog training app? No. It is a full platform that will provide answers to ALL of your canine queries. Yes, we provide free behavioral content, all originally illustrated, but Woofbuzz goes a lot further than this.
nodes.title: Woofbuzz - Provides tools to ensure your dog‚Äôs daily needs are met
